A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is full of cringeworthy moments that are unbecoming of a Star Wars film.  Development of characters introduced in The Force Awakens is nonexistent and their deaths are underwhelming.  Opportunities for potentially great scenes and dialogue are squandered and we are left with mediocrity instead.  Luke Skywalker is reduced from a wise\, disciplined Jedi master to an emo\, rude punk for most of his time on screen.  He is destructive not only of himself but also\, not unlike the creators of this movie\, destructive of the great tradition that came before.  New Star Wars does a great job of capturing the look of Star Wars\, but a terrible job of imitating the feeling.  Other than one or two scenes per film\, New Star Wars has no soul.
